title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{5x\left(x^2-4\right)}{\left(x^2+5x+6\right) 10x}$$
speech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  fraction, 5 x, parentheses, x squared minus 4, , over, parentheses, x squared plus 5 x plus 6  times 10 x,

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{5x\left(x^2-4\right)}{\left(x^2+5x+6\right) 10x}=\frac{5x\left(x+2\right) \left(x-4\right)}{\left(x+3\right) \left(x+2\right) 10x}=\frac{x-4}{2\left(x+3\right)}$$
speech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  fraction, 5 x, parentheses, x squared minus 4, , over, parentheses, x squared plus 5 x plus 6  times 10 x,  is equal to fraction, 5 x, parentheses x plus 2,  times, parentheses x minus 4, , over, parentheses x plus 3,  times, parentheses x plus 2,  times 10 x,  is equal to fraction, x minus 4, over, 2 times, parentheses x plus 3, ,
